title: Noor Alfallah sister has piano lessons with Ronnie Wood
text:
Sir Mick Jagger is still thought to be in a romance with Melanie Hamrick.

But his former fling, Noor Alfallah, 25, still regularly 'likes' pictures of her former lover and what's more, it seems she's still close to the rest of the Rolling Stones band.

Ahead of the release of Ronnie Wood's documentary, Somebody Up There Likes Me, she shared a clip of her little sister Sophia, 13, having a piano lesson with Ronnie, 72.

Still pals: Sir Mick Jagger's ex lover Noor Alfallah 25, shared a picture of her younger sister Sophia, 13, having piano lessons with Rolling Stones rocker Ronnie Wood, 72

Ex: Noor dated Mick for around three years, ending their romance in 2018, while he was with Melanie Hamrick - she shared this picture with Mick, Ronnie and his wife Sally in April 2018

Sophia looked nervous about performing in front of him, but he could be seen encouraging her and giving her tips on how to play.

Noor wrote: 'Somebody Up There Likes Me doc premieres tonight, shared on Saturday. Good luck @sallywood1 @ronniewood.

Kuwaiti-American heiress Noor, had a romance with Mick, 76, in 2017, when she was aged 23 and he was aged 74.

Moving on: In December, 2018, it was reported that Noor had cooled things between herself and Mick after she was wooed by billionaire Nicolas Berggruen, 58, (pictured)

Close: He bears a passing resemblance to Mick and is aged 58

It was initially reported to have been a short fling, but the Mail On Sunday later reported that they had a romance for around three years - they first met in 2015.

Meanwhile, ballerina Melanie, 32, who has been dating Mick since 2014, gave birth to the rocker's eighth child, Deveraux, in December 2016.

In December, 2018, it was reported that Noor had cooled things between herself and Mick after she was wooed by billionaire Nicolas Berggruen.

Current love: Meanwhile, ballerina Melanie, 32, who has been dating Mick since 2014, gave birth to the rocker's eighth child, Deveraux, in December 2016 (pictured in February)

He bears a passing resemblance to Mick and is aged 58.

In August of that year, she shared a snap of herself with Nicolas wishing her 'partner in crime' a happy birthday and telling him: 'So happy I get to celebrate with you.'

Yet in this August, she shared a picture of him and wrote: 'Happy Birthday Nicolas! My bestie for life! Thank you for being such a wonderful, sweet, and loyal friend!

'Wishing you many more to come! Next year.'

Mick was previously married once to Bianca Jagger and Jerry Hall, who he 'fake-married' in Bali in the 1990s.

He has had a string of other lovers, including Marianne Faithful, Chrissie Shrimpton, Anita Pallenberg, Luciana Gimenez and Carla Bruni.

He was also in a long-term romance with fashion designer L'Wren Scott from 2001 up but she sadly took her own life in March 2014.

Mick has eight children in total.
description: Sir Mick Jagger is still thought to be in a romance with Melanie Hamrick.
